class articles.models.User(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: AbstractUser

class Roles(*values)[source]

Bases: TextChoices

READER = 'reader'
EDITOR = 'editor'
JOURNALIST = 'journalist'
role

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

subscriptions_publishers

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

subscriptions_journalists

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

affiliated_publisher

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

clean()[source]

Ensure users don’t set invalid role-specific fields.

save(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Normalize fields based on role when saving.

get_independent_articles()[source]

Get articles published independently by this journalist (no publisher).

get_independent_newsletters()[source]

Get newsletters published independently by this journalist (no publisher).

get_subscribed_publishers()[source]

Get publishers this reader is subscribed to.

get_subscribed_journalists()[source]

Get journalists this reader is subscribed to.

class articles.models.ResetToken(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

One-time password reset token for a user.

Stores a hashed token string with an expiry and usage timestamp.

user

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

token_hash

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

created_at

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

expires_at

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

used_at

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

is_expired()[source]

Return True if the token has passed its expiry time.

Return type:

bool

is_used()[source]

Return True if the token has already been consumed.

Return type:

bool
